attributes.action: Make buying property easier for those who have always been responsible for themselves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Allow those who have been born and bred in the UK, worked for a living, earn a so called decent wage, who are law abing and responsible. Be able to afford a decent place to own of reasonable size and without fear of losing it due to increase in rates and utiity bills etc, therefore allowing them to start a family responsibly

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
